name: Memix (BrightEyes)
description:

this game was made for the gdevelop weekend game jam with the theme being "warioware-like minigames" (https://itch.io/jam/gdevelop-weekend-jam-1)

so then i made this horrendous game. not sure if im legally allowed to call it a game at this point, but ive lost all motivation to work any longer on it, so here you go.

the game is extremely short. thats all you need to know.

your reaction when you play this game
